definition.name: HoverCard
definition.purpose: Provides a wrapper for displaying a hover card UI element
definition.description: A reusable component that renders a hover card using Radix UI's HoverCardPrimitive.Root. It passes all props to the underlying primitive and adds a data-slot attribute for targeting.

initial.data: No content is shown until the trigger is hovered.

visible: Nothing, unless used with a trigger and content

when.description: The user hovers over the trigger element
The user moves the mouse away from the trigger or content

definition.visualLayout: Acts as a wrapper for the hover card system; must be used with a trigger and content component.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's HoverCardPrimitive.Root. All props are forwarded. Use with HoverCardTrigger and HoverCardContent.

definition.name: HoverCardTrigger
definition.purpose: Acts as the trigger for displaying the hover card
definition.description: A reusable component that renders the trigger for the hover card using Radix UI's HoverCardPrimitive.Trigger. It passes all props to the underlying primitive and adds a data-slot attribute for targeting.

initial.data: Trigger element is rendered but hover card content is hidden.

when.description: The user hovers over the trigger element

definition.visualLayout: Renders the trigger element for the hover card.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's HoverCardPrimitive.Trigger. All props are forwarded. Should be used inside HoverCard.

definition.name: HoverCardContent
definition.purpose: Displays the content of the hover card when triggered
definition.description: A reusable component that renders the content of the hover card using Radix UI's HoverCardPrimitive.Content and Portal. It supports custom alignment, side offset, and additional class names for styling. Uses a utility function for class name merging.

align.description: Alignment of the hover card content

sideOffset.description: Offset of the content from the trigger

initial.data: Hover card content is hidden until triggered.

when.description: The user hovers over the trigger element

effects: Hover card content is displayed in a portal with animation and custom styling

definition.visualLayout: Renders the hover card content in a portal with animation and custom styling.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's HoverCardPrimitive.Content and Portal. Uses cn utility for class names. Accepts align, sideOffset, and className props.
